content: table mat materials small amounts of 2 colors of cotton worsted weight yarn such as peaches and crème size h hook gauge not important size approx 7 inches- this may vary depending on type of yarn used and your gauge with color a make an magic_ring as shown here craftsy work rounds 1 and 2 with color a round 1 once the magic loop is made chain 2 this counts as the first double_crochet then make 9 more double_crochet s for a total of 10 double_crochet join with a slip st to the top of the first stitch round 2 chain 2 this counts as the first double_crochet then make one double_crochet in the same st next 2 double_crochet in each of the next 9 sts join with a slip st to the top of the first stitch cut yarn total of 20 sts work rounds 3 and 4 with color b round 3 join color b with a slip st to the top of any st and chain 2 this counts as the first double_crochet double_crochet in the same st then double_crochet in the next st now * 2dc in the next st 1 double_crochet in the next st * 9 times join with a slip st to the top of the first stitch total sts 30 round 4 chain 2 this counts as the first double_crochet double_crochet in the same st then 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts now * 2dc in the next st 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts * 9 times join with a slip st to the top of the first stitch cut yarn total sts 40 work rounds 5 and 6 in color b round 5 join color b with a slip st to the top of any st and chain 2 this counts as the first double_crochet double_crochet in the same st then 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts now * 2dc in the next st 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts * 9 times join with a slip st to the top of the first stitch total sts 50 round 6 round 4 chain 2 this counts as the first double_crochet double_crochet in the same st then 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts now * 2dc in the next st 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts * 9 times join with a slip st to the top of the first stitch cut yarn total sts 60 work round 7 in color a round 7 join color a with a slip st in any st single_crochet in same st skip next st 4 double_crochet in next st then *skip next st single_crochet in next st skip next st 4 double_crochet in next st *14 times next join with slip st to top of first single_crochet cut yarn total of 15 shells of 4 double_crochet weave in all loose ends notes 1 when instructed to
